I was confused about the ticket I bought. It said I had entrance to the castle and museums and the funicular down‚Ä¶.but I was not aware that i could take the funicular UP! So I hiked up the hill to the castle. I suppose I should have checked before I took the hike - I learned that day. So my advice is to just check at the funicular station first to see if the ticket will work or not. Other than that, the castle is beautiful and the views are breathtaking‚Ä¶.I highly recommend it. There is also a puppet museum, a cafe, and a wine bar.

La proposta acquistata su Booking si √® rivelata non veritiera: in descrizione si capiva che un bambino entrava gratis con un biglietto adulto pagante; quindi ho acquistato per 2 adulti ma al check-in per convertire la prenotazione in ticket, mi √® stato detto che ho pagato 40 euro solo x 2 adulti e non vi √® traccia di prenotazione per i ragazzi, e in cassa avremmo pagato 38 euro per 4 col family pack. Inoltre le indicazioni sulla prenotazione dicevano di ritirare i ticket validi per l'ingresso ad un indirizzo che √® al castello alla fine della funicolare, fatte le scale, quindi si sarebbe pagato la funicolare per nulla se avessi dato retta a Booking. Speriamo che migliorino il servizio e soprattutto non ricarichino cos√¨ tanto il costo del servizio

This was just a ticket to get in to the castle and to ride the funicular.  It served its purpose - I still had to wait in line to get my digital ticket converted to a paper ticket before I could enter.   A read that a person can walk around the castle grounds without a ticket, but if you want to go in certain rooms and see certain exhibits, a ticket is needed.
Useless.  This will get you a voucher that you need to use to get the tickets.   You still need to stand in the same line and the tickets cost the same.

Kasteel is best chaotisch en niet alle ruimtes zijn bereikbaar. Veel ruimtes waren toegankelijk ook zonder toegangsbewijs, dus ‚Ç¨ 12,00 voor die paar waar het wel nodig was ( binnenkamer met schermen, video virtuele kasteel en uitkijktoren) was veel te veel. Bovendien zou er audio gids inbegrepen zijn, maar dat was niet het geval. Het heeft dan geen voordeel om het kaartje via boeking te kopen, want ter plaatse kost het even veel (retourtje kabelbaan+ kasteel= ‚Ç¨ 16,00) Park rondom kasteel is leuk en vrij groot (en gratis)
Amazing blend of ancient ruins and reconstruction with very modern materials and design to create a maze of useable public space. Not just another old castle, definite wow factor

Vista stupenda sulla piccola e graziosa Lubiana. Suggestiva la salita con la funicolare. Le sale interne del castello non sono un granch√© ma la vista dall‚Äôalto vale il prezzo del biglietto.
The viewing tower was my favorite part! Really interesting castle! Beautiful views! Stay for sunset, if you can!

The castle is visible from the entire city, so it's easy to get excited for this visit. We chose to ride the funicular up (which I recommend as it's a steep walk). Once inside, it's easy to navigate around, including climbing the tower.

The views from the castle can't be beat and thus, this is a must-do activity while visiting Ljubljana.
Siamo rimasti piacevolmente sorpresi del restauro, dell'uso degli spazi e del tour. In questo modo si mantiene viva una cos√¨ bella struttura.

The castle is worth a visit. The ticket is supposed to be online but it does not work when you scan at the entrance. The personnel was generally cool about it, but one guy did not want to let us leave and was rude about it, even though it was not our fault. This mismatch between what you sell and how it functions should be fixed, guys. And then it‚Äôs a good experience.

First to know: When you print your voucher btw it's not your ticket, simply go to the ticket booth for the funicular and exchange it there. I got the full ticket that gives you access to a roundtrip ride on the funicular and to the entirety of the castle and it's exhibits. I found in every turn their was something to see in this Castle and I found the audio guide + the placards by most of the displays gave tons of info about what Ljubljana Castle was in the past to the present. They've done an amazing job preserving this castle and it's beautiful inside and out and I recommend a visit inside.
